articles.title: Good News, Buyers. Redfin Says Sellers Are Finally Slashing Home Prices - The Motley Fool
articles.description: The online listing giant says interest rates are pushing down home prices, but the market is still mostly hot.
articles.content:
Buyers looking for relief in a sizzling home market might finally be seeing some in the form of falling home prices.
